parts.text: {"word":"non-mutation-specific","priority":"Low","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"突然変異特異的でない、非突然変異特異的","english_definition":"Not specific to a particular mutation; effective or applicable regardless of the specific mutation present.","examples":[{"sentence":"This treatment is non-mutation-specific, meaning it can work for patients with various genetic mutations.","translation":"この治療法は非突然変異特異的であり、様々な遺伝子変異を持つ患者に効果があることを意味します。"},{"sentence":"We need to develop non-mutation-specific therapies to address the broad range of genetic variations.","translation":"広範囲な遺伝的変異に対応するために、非突然変異特異的な治療法を開発する必要があります。"}],"collocations":["non-mutation-specific therapy","non-mutation-specific treatment","non-mutation-specific approach","non-mutation-specific drug"],"synonyms":["mutation-independent","mutation-agnostic","broad-spectrum"],"antonyms":["mutation-specific"],"related_words":["mutation","specific","therapy","treatment","genetic","mutation-specific"],"usage_notes":{"explanation":"This term is commonly used in the context of medicine and genetics to describe treatments or therapies that are effective across a range of genetic mutations, rather than targeting a single, specific mutation. It is often used when discussing approaches that address the underlying mechanisms of a disease, rather than the specific genetic cause.","priority":"Medium"},"level_frequency":{"frequency_google_ngram":"Low","priority":"Low"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"The term 'non-mutation-specific' is a technical term used in genetics and medicine. It describes a treatment or therapy that is not designed to target a particular genetic mutation. Instead, it works regardless of the specific mutation present. This is often used when discussing treatments that address the broader mechanisms of a disease, rather than the specific genetic cause. Understanding this term requires a background in biology or medicine."}]}],"etymology":{"value":"Formed by adding the prefix 'non-' (meaning 'not') to 'mutation-specific'.","priority":"Low"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌnɒnˌmjuːˈteɪʃən spəˈsɪfɪk/","syllables":"non-mu-ta-tion spe-ci-fic"},"inflection":{},"common_mistakes":{},"level_frequency":{},"example_sentences":[]}
